title: EastEnders spoilers: Gray's anger at Chantelle grows again
text:
Gray Atkins (Toby Alexander-Smith) has been physically assaulting wife Chantelle (Jessica Plummer) in EastEnders, and — even though he’s promised to seek help for his violent behaviour — the solicitor’s anger gets the better of him once more in the coming episodes.

Viewers were stunned several months back when, after being introduced as a perfect couple, the reality of Gray and Chantelle’s marriage was revealed when the solicitor physically assaulted his wife. Subsequent months have seen the violent behaviour continue, but Gray promised to get a handle on the situation when Chantelle announced that she was pregnant.

The solicitor promised to attend therapy for his anger issues and Chantelle was delighted as a result. However, her positive outlook could well be short-lived, as problems persist in the coming episodes.

Chantelle is overjoyed when Denise (Diane Parish) asks her to cover a shift at the salon. The young woman takes delight in being back at work — but it’s clear that she keeps this information from Gray.

Meanwhile, a girl steals from Whitney’s (Shona McGarty) stall, and Gray sets off to apprehend her. As a result, he ends up passing by the salon, where he sees Chantelle hard at work — much to his dismay.

Chantelle later arrives at The Queen Vic, but she’s shocked to see everyone there. However, the reason soon becomes apparent, as Gray announces their news to them all.

It’s pretty evident that his motivations for doing so stem from the anger he feels over the fact that Chantelle lied.

How will Chantelle react?

One to watch: Monday 21st October at 8pm on BBC One.
